import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaChevronDown, FaChevronRight } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faBars, faTimes } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { FaSomeIcon } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { FaFileAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { Home, SupervisorAccount, Logout } from '@mui/icons-material'; // const CustomMenuButtonColor = 'bg-gray'; // const DesplegableBackgroundColor = 'bg-red '; const StaffSidebar = () => { const [activeMenu, setActiveMenu] = useState(null); const toggleSubMenu = (index) => { setActiveMenu((prevActiveMenu) => (prevActiveMenu === index ? null : index)); }; return (
